website_summaries.verdict: Highest over-the-counter dosage of melatonin on the market.
pros: Owners rave that each capsule contains more melatonin, a natural hormone that helps regulate sleep, than usually found in store brands
Tends to make you sleepy within 20 minutes
Most people don't experience any side effects
cons: Like all sleep aids, this brand didn't work for some people

customer_reviews.title: Sleep right through the disaster that is your life!
customer_reviews.text: Are you anxious, troubled, and alone? Do you find yourself in bed each night staring at the clock and begrudgingly counting down the minutes and hours you have until you need to be up to go to the job you hate with the awful people you think are idiots just so you could bring home the paycheck you've already spent? Well these pills purport to be able to help, and they do! Just keep these near your bed and you'll be fine. Well.. not "fine" fine. You'll still be a hot mess. And this will not bring you love. But at least you'll be well rested! ... except for the nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Student

customer_reviews.title: The strength is as advertised. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking melatonin for a while so I expected that when I purchased this product it may not have much effect on me because of tolerance. After two months of using Puritan's Pride it still has a strong effect on me. It used to take me about 45-60 minutes to fall asleep every night with my old melatonin, with this brand I usually fall asleep 20-25 minutes after I take it and I'll be out for a solid 8 hours at least. If I do happen to wake up within those 8 hours I'm able to fall right back to sleep again which I was never able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: My oncologist recommended melatonin due to recent studies with cancer patients
customer_reviews.text: I take 1 10mg a night. Within 30 min I FEEL the effect and I'm ready to sleep. My oncologist recommended melatonin due to recent studies with cancer patients. This product is quality. I received 2 bottles for the price shown.
customer_reviews.author: Cranefamily208

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different brands of melatonin and Puritan's Pride is the most effective. After decades of chronic sleep deficit, this is the magic pill!! The key is finding your effective dose. Mine is 20mg and I sleep like a baby. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Positive sleep difference
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to try melatonin once again, as any aid in falling asleep and maintaining a deeper sleep; in the past, it was only a subtle assistance. However, I'm finding that this 10 mg melatonin does help me with less wakefulness overnight, sleeping deeply enough not to be awakened by every little change in my body and still be alert as needed during the night and upon morning awakening. That's what I'd like and, what I'm getting with this 10mg. supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: I take one about an hour before bedtime and sleep so much better as a result
customer_reviews.text: Man, but do these WORK! I take one about an hour before bedtime and sleep so much better as a result. No more tossing and turning! That and I don't wake up ridiculously early. There's nothing worse than waking up at three or four in the morning and not being able to go back to sleep. The melatonin really helps with this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine ShuckTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Higher dose melatonin from the premier name in natural health
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has POTS syndrome, which wreaks holy terror on her body's sleep rhythms. Melatonin is a safe and simple means of gently redirecting the body into natural schedules, and Puritan's Pride has justifiably earned its reputation for quality. These are high dose melatonin tabs, higher than most people will need. (The average person could halve one of these tablets for a more appropriate dose.) If you need high-dose melatonin,this set provides an easy alternative to swallowing fists full of smaller tablets at once.
customer_reviews.author: Twisterjester

customer_reviews.title: The outer casing has a funny taste, so I try to plug my nose ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they work well. The outer casing has a funny taste, so I try to plug my nose and swallow the pill quickly. Also, I mentioned to my Dr. that I was taking this dose and she said that it's misleading as the body tends to only be able to "use" 5mg effectively. I'll be switching to the lower dose when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: I should’ve known better because they seemed like too great of a deal.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why these are rated so highly. I took two (that’s 20mg) and stayed up the same amount of time I normal sleep (3am) without these. There are other brands I’ve used that would do a better jobs with one tablet or gummy with a smaller dosage. Maybe some people have gotten a good batch, but these are definitely not extra strength. Anyone have recommendations on some decent brands that aren’t super expensive. I’ve used Olly gummies. They work great, but are pretty expensive. About $20 for 25 gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Anicete

customer_reviews.title: This brand works much better than other brands to help you sleep
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from occasional insomnia and this product helps me to fall asleep and stay asleep better than other brands and I've tried just about every brand of melatonin on the market. Easy to take
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: The best melatonin for reducing anxiety and combatting insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product multiple times. I buy it for both myself (who suffers from insomnia) and my English Mastiff who suffers from Cushings disease. It decreases his anxiety from the symptoms of his disease and allows him to rest more peacefully. Note: I take double the recommended dose. I’m not in anyway advocating for others to do that. I am just stating this because I have found that in my case (I also suffer from serious health issues) that two pills work better than one.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I use melatonin every night. I normally take 3 3mg so 9mg every night. I bought these because it’s 10mg and I would only need one. I don’t know what they do to these but it was like taking caffeine instead of melatonin. I was very awake and alert for hours after taking this so I woke up tired. I tried for a few days and had the same results.
customer_reviews.author: kylee

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we have been really pleased with the strength and feeling we get after taking these supplements. I don't sleep great due to anxiety and stress. I have been taking sleep aide for quite a while, but and nervous that I am becoming dependent. This Melatonin is a good substitute and I really believe that they are working as intended. I would recommend to anyone as a first trial into sleeping aids that do not have drowsiness drugs in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep Aid Without Feeling Drugged
customer_reviews.text: Have used a variety of brands over the years. This melatonin is hands down, some of the best. Restful, quality sleep when taken 30 minutes before heading off to bed with no hangover in the mornings. I’m subject to call-outs for work in the middle of the night. There is no problem with waking, functioning and being alert after a quick shower and off I go.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe it’s real melatonin!
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is real melatonin. For weeks I tried using it to sleep, my anxiety was horrible. Then I decided to not use any sleep helper. I tried once more to use this melatonin and was suddenly kept awake with horrible anxiety again all night long. I’m convinced this stuff has some sort of tea or filler in it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Matt

customer_reviews.title: Give it shot.
customer_reviews.text: This product does help with having me fall asleep on my normal schedule. But it does not keep me in the nightly sleep process for the 6.5 - 8 hrs goal that is most healthy. I still have to rely on another medication to hit that full night's sleep mark. I should mention that I am still in the healing period after major oral surgery. This probably has a major influence on the effectiveness of the Melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many brands of sleep aid to help me sleep, but I can't seem to get a full 8 hours much to say 4 hours of sleep even when taking this sleep aide. I wake up after around 2-3 hours and have a hard time falling back to sleep again. Lots of reviews stated it worked and I thought that I finally got a break. It's not easy working the midnight shift and then having little to no sleep is brutal. I wish I could take more then the recommended dosage or something. I needs sleep...
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Up all night! No effect at all.
customer_reviews.text: When my previous Melatonin of another brand was almost gone I ordered these. I thought I’d got a deal. My other ones worked like they were supposed to. However, these have no effect at all. I won’t be ordering these again. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: Missblissful

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to report that is a fine product..and strength 10 is perfect for putting me off to a good nights sleep. If I wake up during the night..I take one more..then sleep to 7:30am ! I am retired...and "older" so no need to rush off in the morning. But a good night's sleep is a "must"!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie RG

customer_reviews.title: One star, is too high of rating.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of Melatonin, which were much better. With other brands, even at same dosages, worked much better. I have found that taking this brand, I can count on maybe two or three hours of sleep. I have started having to take a higher dose in order to sleep more than three hours. I definitely won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Afton C.

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I ordered these!
customer_reviews.text: I hope that this company always carries this product. I can't imagine trying to get through a night without them. My husband's snoring keeps me awake all night... We've tried every product under the sun (for him and for me, including earplugs and white noise machines) and Puritan's Pride's Super Strength Rapid Release Melatonin is the only thing that helps me sleep through his snoring. This brand, this product in 10 mg each is perfect. 10 mg makes it possible for me to adjust my intake if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to kick in and leaves me feeling groggy in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these. I got these to replace my last batch of quick dissolve melatonin supplements. Those worked great, they made me sleepy within 30 minutes, and had me feeling refreshed in the morning. These do not make me feel tired, even after an hour or more of taking them, and I always have trouble waking up and feel groggy. I'm going back to the quick dissolve 10 mgs.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy V

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing, better than any product I have been purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking melatonin to help me sleep for the past 10 years or so. I have been taking 10mg every night for about the past 5 years. These are amazing, better than any product I have been purchasing from local drugstores. I wake up feeling rested. I am experiencing the vivid dreams again but to me that means its working. Only con, it takes about an hour to hour and a half for it to work. Will be buying more of!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do it's job
customer_reviews.text: Terrible melatonin. I have used many different types in my day and this is worthless. It doesn't help me fall asleep which is the whole point. Go ahead and buy other brands as this was a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: This gave me a bad headache.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it is too strong for me or has some additives that are a problem for me. I was taking two 3mg melatonins previously and not sleepiing as well as I would like, so I tried this one. The company did promptly refund my money, so I guess I still feel good about the company and would order from them again. Just didn't work for me. I do have several food sensitivities so not sure if they might have powdered milk or rice powder in it, but that could give me a headache, but wouldn't for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Oliver

customer_reviews.title: not as effective as 3mg of other brands
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a 3mg, and some nights 6mg of a different brand. I bought these thinking, 1 pill 10mg. on the 3 or 6 of the other brand I fell asleep easily and if I got woken up during the night was able to go back to sleep easily. After a week of these, I have yet to sleep all night and usually spend half an hour waiting to fall asleep. Not sure what the 10mg indicates, but I don't believe it's Melatonin. I will be purchasing my previous brand again and tossing these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J

customer_reviews.title: ineffective and customer service is abysmal
customer_reviews.text: These 10mg capsules don't have any effect on anyone in my household. We have purchased the 3 and 5mg tables from NatureMade and those are noticeably more effective than this 10mg placebo. I have had good luck with Puritan's Pride in the past, unsure why these are not effective. Update: After a short non productive conversation with customer service, I will never purchase items from Puritan's Pride ever again. lot# 495531-01 EXP 02/22
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Twain

customer_reviews.title: Went back to Natrol Melatonin!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my 9yo. It was as though I gave him No Doze! I had to go back to the Natrol brand Melatonin. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kay in Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: It's working
customer_reviews.text: I take medicine that causes insomnia and the doctor recommended Melatonin. Was not pleased with the brand I was taking since it didn't work. I know that Puritan's Pride is one of the best brands so I switched to Puritan's Pride 10mg and it seems to be working better than anything else. I still wake up every 2 to 3 hours but at least I'm getting 7 to 8 hours sleep each night.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeping aid I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have used at least ten different melatonin products for over 5 years and this is the best one I have discovered. You stay a sleep all during the night, yet it does not make me feel drugged when you need to use the bathroom. I find it easy to get back to sleep and feel no after effects in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: julia haberman

customer_reviews.title: Better Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This is a higher dosage than I've heard most people take but it is right for me. I fall asleep within 15 minutes. I sleep much more sound. I can sleep through my husband's snoring more easily and his breathing changes. I also sleep longer. In my experience this is best taken when you can sleep more than 6 hours or there is a groggy feeling. I will buy more when this supply runs out. I sleep better!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: A safe and restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: Before my father passed he was daunted with dementia and agitation. He would pace non-stop all night long. I didn't want to try RX sleeping pills or meds to calm him because of the danger of falling. I just needed him to sleep before he developed a heart attack or a stroke. Sleep, that was the cure and I promptly ordered your Melatonin. It worked, completely and safely. He slept peacefully every night. Thank you. Rose
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Wan

customer_reviews.title: Melatonin works for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are just regular capsules. No sweet taste or anything different. But they are a life saver if you can't get to sleep!! I have had difficulty sleeping for most of my life and I have tried many things. The medication I was given by my doctor caused me to have terrible nightmares. I have also tried other over the counter medication that also caused nightmares. Never that a problem with Melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Pullin

customer_reviews.title: Lights out...with Melatonin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on sale, but usually go with the quick dissolve ones. These pills are small, easy to swallow, and have no taste associated with them. I normally have issues swallowing pills, but no problem here. I think they do work as intended, to gradually induce a tire effect and aid in sleep. Your body gets used to these, so I only take them as needed. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Angus

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Potent and effective melatonin caps. Not physically large, no taste or powder on the outside, and I sleep like a baby. Glad they come in two bottles, I will sleep well for months!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Used in conjuction with Lingans for Cushings.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Used to treat cushings in my dog. Worked very well to mask side effects of cushings. Will not cure it but helps with all the complications and didn't harm my doogie. Used in conjuction with Iingans.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have the WORST time trying to fall a sleep in the evenings. I take 1 pill and get the best sleep ever!! If I wake up to take a sip of water or a potty run...I am easily able to fall right back to sleep! I am resting so well now and have so much more energy in the day! Thank you thank you thank you!!!! Mama-P
customer_reviews.author: Patra Largent

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick to my stomach. 10mg too much? Update
customer_reviews.text: Shipped out fast, unfortunately the 10 mg made me sick to my stomach and I was woozy all night 2 separate nights not in a row. Not sure if it’s the high dosage or it reacted with my meds. I’ve takin 5mg of a different brand before with no issues. Update!! I’m now up to 10mg with no problems works fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Let me get some sleep
customer_reviews.text: I always have problems sleeping and these are a big help. The pills are very easy to swallow and are fast acting. There are 120 capsules per bottle so you will not be running out of them soon. I was asleep within 45 mins to an hour and finally got a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a year now. It really keeps me asleep all night long. I take it about 30-60 minutes before bed and I am out like a light. However, if I have caffeine late in the day, I can't fault the melatonin for keeping me awake!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: My brother raved about this so decided I'd try it. No relief for me. Just some fuzziness. Guess depends on the individual.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quantity and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a very difficult time going to sleep, so take multiple 10 MG Melatonin, as well as other prescribed medicines for RLS, etc. The price is great, and I've been happy this this so far. Sleep a good 3 hrs straight, which is almost a record for me over the past 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy these! I usually use Nature’s Bounty but thought I would buy these as the price and reviews were great. I was awake all night with my heart pounding. Felt like I was on speed. Horrible! Needless to say they went in the garbage. I had Nature’s Bounty delivered the next day through CVS and Instacart and slept like a baby. So much for reading reviews on Amazon - now I can’t trust them. 😟
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Use every night
customer_reviews.text: This was a good deal for two bottles of melatonin. I have almost finished the second bottle and will be ordering more. Seem to be as effective as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Suspect
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a ziplock bag and do not make me sleepy at all. I feel like it might be a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Sandman cometh
customer_reviews.text: Idk wtf they put in this pill, but I woke up a week later with my underwear over my head, upside down in a trailer park surrounded by a hippie nudist colony. 5/5 would purchase again, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Moaddab

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: These pills have the most horrible flavor! It haunts you well after you’ve swallowed them when you burp.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work! Ive tried a lot of melatonin and they work fast but not this...this ithem gives me nothing!
customer_reviews.author: JANI

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. I have tried several types of melatonin and this is like taking nothing. Stick with Natrol brand!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: This is i guess my fault not checking on the label . I thought it is chewable. I get good sleep with it though. Its just that I' m used to just swallowing melatonin and enjoy the fruity flavor. I need water to drink this . But so far I get the same supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Acers Muena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think the work
customer_reviews.text: I don’t believe these are real. I took lik 8 after unsuccessfully not noticing a sleepy ness after hours of digestion and still did not fall asleep, there was another brand that I have tried that worked as I dream heavily after taking them. Won’t say what they are as I’m a real customer not trying to promote a brand
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Burd

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with insomnia and anxiety at night and this supplement has helped take the edge off. Not to say it knocks me out cold, but I have seen a major improvement in my ability to fall asleep and go back to sleep after anxiety nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Doriann Shelly

customer_reviews.title: help with your sleepy time night time regulation
customer_reviews.text: from what i've heard, melatonin helps with regulating your diurnal cycle, allowing you to sleep better at night. i don't know - i don't use these, but my spouse does, and so far she has no qualms with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Arterburn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I just got this a few days ago. I've started off taken 2 10mg tablets hoping to get a good night sleep. I want buy this product again. They dont work. I was up all night the second night I took them. They aren't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has always struggled with falling asleep, it's great to finally have found something that works. These are strong enough even for me. Take one with my other vitamins an hour before I want to be in bed, and by the time I get there I fall asleep quickly. They've made all the difference in being able to finally establish a regular sleep schedule.
customer_reviews.author: B. Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Melatonin pills. I was taking sometimes 30mg to sleep now I take 10mg with this brand and i just fall asleep!!! I never write reviews but these are truly the best and work very fast. I don't wake up groggy because I am only taking 10mg.
customer_reviews.author: letalove

customer_reviews.title: High quality Melatonin. Fall asleep quickly ans stay asleep longer with this product.
customer_reviews.text: This melatonin is high quality. It comes in pill form and works quickly. I fall asleep quickly and wake us less through out the night. Without it, I normally wake up between 2-4 times a night. While taking this I have been able to sleep through the night and wake up well rested.
customer_reviews.author: nicole5821

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other ones from nature valley or something like that, they were 3mg and they made me want to take a nap 10-30min after taking them, these I could take in the morning and be just fine if I wanted to. It might just be me, any supplement will work differently for everyone, but I’ve used melatonin before so I don know...
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Sofie Holm

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I take 10 mg melotonin before going to bed to help me sleep. These pills are perfect. They are easy to take, tasteless and release the melotonin gradually rather than all at once. They seem to work and I plan to continue taking them.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Age Related Sleep Difficulties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rather than the 5mg brand I got locally. So far it has performed perfectly. I no longer waken after 2-3-4 hours of sleep. I am 77 and am affected by age-related sleep difficulties which this product has 95% solved. Thanks, Puritan's Pride.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Scott, PA

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what I got
customer_reviews.text: These actually kept me awake. It may have been something besides the melatonin, but I could sleep when I quit taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dolan

customer_reviews.title: good value for price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these melatonin pills for about 6 mos now. They work just fine and compared to some other brands, Puritan's is good value for the money. I would recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Treens

customer_reviews.title: Careful if you have restless legs syndrome!
customer_reviews.text: I have restless legs syndrome that apparently gets aggravated by sleep aids (science fact) but I am an insomniac because of FND. I have a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep. These helped me stay asleep but they messed with my RLS... I struggle more to fall asleep on the melatonin than I did on Benadryl. I might have to just switch back...
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: He loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my restless boyfriend and they put him to sleep so easily now. Although at first he had to experiment if he should take 1 or 2 to see how it effected him and his sleep patterns, he now takes two whenever he can’t get to sleep which is unfortunately most nights, they work wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puritan's Pride Super Strength Rapid Release Capsules Melatonin 10 mg
customer_reviews.text: Made me Nauseous Cut back to 1/2 dose it works, but I personally do not like the feeling the next day
customer_reviews.author: ALLEGRA I.

customer_reviews.title: Super effective
customer_reviews.text: This will be my third or fourth order of these particular capsules. There is no off-taste, they don’t get stuck in my mouth or throat, and they work great. I usually take one about 45 minutes before I want to be asleep and settle in to read a book. And even when I’ve gotten to bed at 10pm and had to be up at 3am for work or such, there’s no groggy feeling with these, whether or not you sleep the entire night. And they work great for my boyfriend too. Reordering his “sleepies” today!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different types of melatonin over the years. This one is really working and was reasonably priced. I would have preferred buyin only one bottle and not two. Who needs that much melatonin?
customer_reviews.author: TexasTom

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: This puritan prides sleeping aid is not effective at all. I took one didnt work took two didn't work. Took four didnt work. Must have forgotten the sleeping remedy part. I understand maybe rushing too much because of high demand. And the Covid19 just bang bang and out to market for distribution.
customer_reviews.author: cember whyms

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Bad Headaches
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop taking, as they gave me a splitting headache every single time. My husband is taking them now, just to finish them off. They might work fine for others, but if you're more sensitive to things like this, be advised.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Capsule Melatonin
customer_reviews.text: We give my son melatonin every night because he struggles falling asleep. This product works great but my son wss a little turned off to them being capsules, good thing is they don't have a funny taste as some capsules do.
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl Bayona

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have bad insomnia from 2 auto immunes. Had been using 3mg with hit and miss success. The only problem is stomach grumbling, not heart burn, if i take the whole cap. I empty half in my water take the other half and drink the rest over next half hour. Sleep like a log!
customer_reviews.author: squishy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible...huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst I have ever tried...didn't work for me at all...they went straight in the trash! If I could give them zero I would! 5 mg fast dissolve melatonin by Natrol puts me right to sleep...these were a huge waste!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Keep it on record List because it works.
customer_reviews.text: Sleep is difficult to achieve in my life due to overall health problems so adding a product like this to my regiment is a wonderful gift. Never sleep long or well without it. One of the best brands I've tried for the quality quantity & price.
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Sleepy Sleepy
customer_reviews.text: I usually get about 5 hours of sleep then wake up and can't get back to sleep so give up and get up. I tried this product last night and even though i still woke up I was able to go back to sleep. That alone is worth 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: D. Grcich

customer_reviews.title: Works the first night
customer_reviews.text: Worked the very first night. Was under a lot of stress and was skeptical but I was asleep in no time. Woke up with no side effects
customer_reviews.author: Kathy higgins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I use melatonin regularly and this brand does it work as well as previous brand used.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Parks

customer_reviews.title: Delayed onset, good price
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as well as dissolvable sublingual tablets I’ve used in the past but it was the best price per milligram I could find on here
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best melatonin I have ever taken
customer_reviews.text: Been using melatonin for about 10 years and for the last 3 years, this product became my favorite. It helped me get off the sleep prescription medication I was taking. I can finally get a 6 hours sleep again.
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for about 3yrs now. Always a great quality and works fast. This melatonin helps me fall asleep and stay asleep, something I have struggled with for years. I don’t have a “hangover” feeling in the morning with this product and that’s why I keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: L E Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Does not work. I have problems falling asleep. I took last night at midnight I did not finally nod off until 5am a few hours before it was time to get up. Other melatonin products have been great. This is not one of them. Also left my mouth dry never had this issue with other melatonin products.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy better than any other bream I have tried and I have tried many
customer_reviews.text: It takes quite a bit to put me out with all of my medical problems but this does the trick . About every other month or so I’ll go for 2 weeks without it and it works good as new
customer_reviews.author: Granny Z

customer_reviews.title: Quick Acting and Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Melatonin I've ever used and the price is fantastic and you get so many, they last forever. One of my best purchases on Amazon. Gave a couple of bottles away because I wanted to share with family members how well they worked. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jana821

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad who has not been able to sleep more than 3-4 hours a night. With these he gets a full nights sleep. He was a skeptic at first but now a firm believer
customer_reviews.author: 86_Trans_Am

customer_reviews.title: Take 1
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazing. Remember to start out with 1 pill, unless you want 14 hours of sleep. They worked within 45 minutes. If you are having difficulty sleeping definitely give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This product is helping me get a hang over free sleep. The only difficulty that I encountered is that it comes as a double pack and I ordered the 120 per bottle. The provider has the bottles of 60 mislabeled as the 120 so i only received half of what I ordered. However, the Customer Representative - Haley C credited me for half of the cost as I only received half the order with no difficulty at all. Overall I am extremely pleased and will order this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy- will give you the worst heartburn of your life.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Capsules dissolve faster than tablets
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if melatonin brands are working when you have severe insomnia. I like this one as it is easy to swallow and since they are capsules, work much faster :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great value! Just keeps on working!
customer_reviews.text: With most melatonin products, my body builds a tolerance and the product seems useless after a couple weeks. Ive been taking this melatonin for months now and it works great everytime. I work nights and going to sleep at odd hours is easy with this stuff. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Puts me to sleep in a hour
customer_reviews.text: I usually have a burst of energy after work when I should be ready to sleep. This helps me get to sleep when I should. It takes about an hour to kick in
customer_reviews.author: PC guy Phill

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical in the beginning only because I had never taken the capsules before. They are easy to swallow with no taste and appears to be doing the job intended. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Adrena Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Tastes Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These work about as well as the several other Melatonin we've purchased but the rapid release feature causes the pills to start dissolving the moment they touch your tongue and, to be honest, these taste terrible. You'd think that in something that dissolves so quickly they would have added a flavoring but they didn't. Probably will try some other brand when these are gone. The price was right but the flavor wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful price and only brand in my night stand now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and work like a dream lol pun intended! Helps me stay asleep, should I wake during the night, I grab another and off to sleep again! No Hanover in the mornings! We love this brand the best of the many we’ve tried!!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: best melatonin
customer_reviews.text: fastest working, strongest melatonin i’ve ever had. works well! i like that it’s a powder in a capsule opposed to a pill- it kicks in quicker.
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as chugging a shot of death green Q, but they certainly get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I pop one down the hatch which reminds me to write a review, but then I fall asleep before I get to it. So, I suppose that’s a ringing endorsement itself?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: As a troubled sleeper, and someone who doesn’t like taking medication this stuff has been a game changer. It knocks me out every night with one pill.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: I've taken Melatonin for about two years now and still have great results with these capsules
customer_reviews.text: These Melatonin capsules are the most effective melatonin I have ever taken. I've taken Melatonin for about two years now and still have great results with these capsules. I am glad I found Puritan's Pride Super Strength Rapid Release Melatonin because it is more effective than the brands I have found in my local stores and they are much less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin2109

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no effect
customer_reviews.text: I have used other forms of Melatonin in 10mg portions. I get sleepy and rest most of the night. This has had no effect and not even when I doubled to 20mg.
customer_reviews.author: Amiizette

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as a great a sleep promoter and I read it is good to take to help prevent Corona along with Zinc.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Greene

customer_reviews.title: Effective and fast-acting, but has a bit of a nasty flavor
customer_reviews.text: These definitely seem to work faster than other melatonin supplements I've tried, and they're just as potent. Only issue is the flavor; the capsules give you an immediate blast of nasty flavor on contact that sticks to your tongue and throat for a few minutes after the fact. It's not bad enough to make you gag, and the product itself is still great, but you'll definitely want to take it with something flavored.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver! Longtime insomnia sufferer and I pop two of these and sleep all night. No side effects.
customer_reviews.author: M, Taylor

product_meta.title: Melatonin by Puritan's Pride, Nighttime Sleep Aid, Super Strength Rapid Release Capsules, 10mg, 2 Bottles of 120 Capsules
product_meta.description: Sometimes it's hard to unwind after a long day. That's when it's time for melatonin, a hormone naturally produced in the body that is closely involved in the natural sleep cycle. It's a terrific choice if you experience occasional sleeplessness or jet lag, or if you want to improve your quality of rest. Melatonin helps you fall asleep quickly and stay asleep longer.
feature_bullets: Fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer*
